<title level="1" right="Hazard 1" pfs="">[Falling Debris](/Hazards.aspx?ID=245)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 33</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A net filled with stones and a small anvil crashes down on someone who steps into the room.

---

**Stealth**
DC 20

**Disable**
DC 17 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) to disarm the trap through a cracked-open door, or <actions string="Three Actions" /> Interact to open the door slowly without triggering the trap

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Drop Debris** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature opens the door without taking care to avoid triggering the trap; **Effect** The net drops a dozen hefty stones and a small but quite hard anvil onto the creature, inflicting 3d6 bludgeoning damage (DC 17 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The sound of this trap going off alerts Gurtlekep in area C8.
